data.name: ACCA: 13-Territory Inspection Dept.: The Swirling Smoke of Rumors in the Castle
data.short_description: Director-General Mauve of ACCA headquarters invites Jean out to dinner, where she asks him for his aid in gathering more information about a brewing coup d'état. Meanwhile, rumors of a coup had reached even the Dōwān royal family. With Prince Schwan's coming of age commemorative ceremony in the
data.supported_languages:
English*, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
